title: Normal Drafts
body: I'm not sure if this has been posted before but I was wondering why doesn't Oceania have Normal Drafts? Is it because it's a new server and is not as massive as other servers or some other reason? Thanks

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=AlphatheBeta,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=OvAqA28f,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-21T21:03:47.306+0000)
>
> Is it because it's a new server and is not as massive as other servers or some other reason? 

Yup, you're spot on. If Draft Pick were enabled on OCE, it could affect queue times by splitting the Summoner's Rift playerbase between two queues instead of one. At the moment, to ensure good matchmaking in a reasonable amount of time, only Blind Pick is available at this time.
